fields.label: Puntuación
fields.description: A puntuación enviarase a calquera LMS, LRS ou a calquera outro servizo que reciba puntuación do H5P para os usuarios que cheguen á pantalla final por defecto

fields.label: Lista do contido do dilema conceptual
Amosar o título do contido na vista
fields.description: Se se selecciona, o usuario verá o título do contido na barra de contido na parte superior

fields.label: Required to be completed
fields.description: Override the individual settings for requiring the content to be finished before activating the "Proceed" button. Will not have any effect if the content doesn't indicate if it was "finished", e.g. images or course presentations with just one slide.

fields.label: Seguinte ID de contido (as pantallas finais defínense con números negativos)
Score for this scenario
fields.description: The score will be sent to any LMS, LRS or any other connected service that receives scores from H5P for users who reach this scenario

fields.label: Behavioural settings
fields.description: This will allow user to go back and see the previous content/question in the scenario

options.label: Aplicar puntuación estática para cada pantalla final
Calcular a puntuación dinamicamente a partir das respostas do usuario

fields.label: Include scores from interactions within the Branching Scenario
fields.description: If chosen scores from for instance Interactive Videos will be added to the total score obtained. If not chosen only scores specified in the feedback sections of the content items, branching questions and end scenarios will count.

fields.label: Override backwards navigation
fields.description: Override the individual settings for enabling backwards navigation

fields.label: Override require content finished
fields.description: Override the individual settings for requiring the content to be finished before activating the "Proceed" button. Will not have any effect if the content doesn't indicate if it was "finished", e.g. images or course presentations with just one slide.

fields.label: Texto para o botón na pantalla inicial
Texto para o botón na pantalla final
Text for the back button on each of the library screens and branching questions
Texto para o botón en cada pantalla da biblioteca
Text for the button used to replay a video
Etiqueta para a puntuación na pantalla final
Label for score on the end screen
